superCodingBot:
SuperCodingBot

This is a Telegram Chatbot for Competitive Ptogrammers. You can use it to, among other things:

  • Get notified about upcoming and ongoing contests
  • Compile and run code from the Bot itself
  • Get programming questions from sites like CODEFORCES and CODECHEF
  • Register your handle of sites like CODECHEF, CODEFORCES, SPOJ, HACKERRANK AND HACKEREARTH and get a ranklist to compete with others
  • Get programming topics from GeeksForGeeks.com

Source CodeDemo
FB-TO-TG-GROUP-CONNECT:
FB-TO-TG-GROUP-CONNECT

A facebook to telegram group connector

Sends posts from a facebook group to a telegram group in realtime


Source Code
help:
• path - display current directory
  • cat FILENAME - display FILENAME in window
  • cd DIRECTORY - move into DIRECTORY or just cd to return to root
  • ls - show files in current directory
  • history - see your command history
  • clear - clear current window
